content.en: Acne research: Researchers have been investigating various aspects of acne management, including new insights, therapeutic algorithms, best practices, and treatment options. While some studies attribute agency to specific organizations like the Global Alliance to Improve Outcomes in Acne Group and the Japanese Dermatological Association, most research questions do not specify the agency of algorithms. Topics of interest also include antibiotic resistance, prescription patterns, over-the-counter products, racial/ethnic variations, and pediatric acne.
content.da: Akneforskning: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige aspekter af aknebehandling, herunder nye indsigter, terapeutiske algoritmer, bedste praksis og behandlingsmuligheder. Mens nogle studier tilskriver agentur til specifikke organisationer som Global Alliance to Improve Outcomes in Acne Group og den Japanske Dermatologiske Forening, specificerer de fleste forskningsspørgsmål ikke algoritmernes agentur. Emner af interesse inkluderer også antibiotikaresistens, receptmønstre, håndkøbsprodukter, racemæssige/etniske variationer og pædiatrisk akne.
